rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0002
rows.name:
No more fighting, Lao. And no more excuses.
The data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0006
rows.name: Go ahead, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Go ahead and shoot—if you're so sure of yourself.
Just don't hit the terminal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0009
rows.name: So what's it gonna be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0010
rows.name: The chest? Or the head?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0010_2
rows.name: You've got a 50/50 chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0011
rows.name:
The fate of all humanity hanging in the balance...
Gotta love those odds![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0012
rows.name: So...what are you waiting for?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0003
rows.name: No, Elma, not like this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0004
rows.name: Step aside, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0005
rows.name:
If I can shut down his mim, there's still
a good chance we can extract the data afterwards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0014
rows.name:
No, dammit, that's not even the point!
We're all on the same side here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0015
rows.name: You...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0016
rows.name: You too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0017
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Elma, listen. I...
I understand Lao's anger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0019
rows.name: I lost my family to an accident a long time ago...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0020
rows.name: But[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0021
rows.name: if someone promised me a chance of saving them,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0022
rows.name:
and that was all a self-serving lie?
I... Who knows what I would do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0023
rows.name: Linly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0024
rows.name: It's disturbing and corrupt and disgusting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0024_2
rows.name: And yet...that's exactly what makes us human![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Maybe...maybe we really should've
been wiped out of existence...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0027
rows.name: But... But then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0028
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0029
rows.name: Lin...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0029_2
rows.name: The data terminal—take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0030
rows.name: What? But, Lao—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0031
rows.name:
I'm abandoning...my...little crusade.
Guess I'm...just as corrupt as anyone else...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0032
rows.name: Lao...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0033
rows.name: I changed my mind...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0034
rows.name: Changed your mind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0035
rows.name:
I thought this was about them,
but...somewhere along the way,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0036
rows.name: it became about me. And about revenge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0037
rows.name: It's over now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0038
rows.name: So go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0039
rows.name: The Lifehold Core has built-in auto-defenses...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0040
rows.name:
It'll take them some time to destroy it...
If you hurry, you might still make it in time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0041
rows.name:
He's right, there's no time to lose.
Lin, can you finish the analysis here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0042
rows.name: It's technically possible...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0043
rows.name:
But without the full NLA mainframe working on it,
it would take way too much time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0044
rows.name:
Then we have no choice.
Let's get back to the city ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0048
rows.name: Lao, too. Come back with us to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0049
rows.name:
Yeah, right.
As if I could ever set foot inside that city again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0050
rows.name:
It won't be like that!
Not once everyone knows the facts, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0051
rows.name: They might not agree, but they will understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0052
rows.name:
You're naïve, Lin. They'd lock me up and toss away the key.
Or worse, a lot worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0053
rows.name:
Maybe, but that's on you. You have a lot to answer to,
so either way, we're taking you back with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0054
rows.name: Heh...I'd rather be shot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0055
rows.name: Come on, Lao. Let's go home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0056
rows.name:
Fine, whatever.
But there's no time to evac me. You go ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0057
rows.name: But that's...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0057_2
rows.name: Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0058
rows.name:
He's right, Lin. Time is running out.
We need to move, and fast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0059
rows.name: All right then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0060
rows.name:
Lao. We'll send some medics for you, okay?
Just stay put.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0061
rows.name:
Until then...you're not allowed to die, you hear me?
I'll see you back in New LA. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0062
rows.name: Sure...great, you got it. Now would you go already?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0063
rows.name: Okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0064
rows.name: Tatsu will split special lunchbox with Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0065
rows.name: Because Linly says Lao not allowed to die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0066
rows.name: So Lao stay alive for Linly or else—or else Tatsu kill him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0067
rows.name: Not allowed to die...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0067_2
rows.name: Of course I'm not...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0068
rows.name:
Even if I killed myself,
I'd just wake up in a new mim anyway...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0069
rows.name: Charmaine, Chenshi...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0069_2
rows.name: I'm so sorry, girls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0070
rows.name: Seems like Papa can't come to be with you just yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0070_2
rows.name: Dammit...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0071
rows.name: I'm sorry...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11100100_MSG0071_2
rows.name: You watch over each other...until I get there...[ST:wait ]
